name: Shmoops!
description: So because of this quarantine, we don't really get to play basketball that much anymore do we, but don't worry, because today is the day that basketball comes to the video game industry! Introducing, Shmoops! The best single player experience you could ever dream of, all for the low low price of... NOTHING! You heard it here first ladies and gentlemen, Shmoops! is free!!! Hope you Enjoy!
